response.overview: Dunhuang is a city that has stood in the desert for over two thousand years. The Silk Road turned it into a cultural melting pot where East met West, giving birth to the world-renowned "Eastern Treasure Trove of Art"—the Mogao Caves. Today, even after the ravages of sand and wind, the door to this world of cross-cultural communication remains open, shining brightly under the protection and legacy of China’s rich and profound history.
response.title: Desert Jewel: Dunhuang
